string.value: A Second Gift for the Dragon Master
When you reach Lvl. 45, #p9010010# starts talking to you...
#b#p9010010##k congratulates you for reaching Lv. 45 and tells you that she will give you a scroll that can be used when you reach Lv. 50.
You received a scroll from #p9010010#. She says she will give you another scroll if you reach Lv. 60 by #bMay 4#k.

Wow! Evan, you've already reached Level 45? That was much faster than I expected! When you reach Level 50, be sure to come see me and I will give you a scroll that can be used on the #t1022097#, as I promised before!
You do know where I am, right? Just come to a town. I'm always here.
Hmm. You're not implying that you don't like the gift that I, #p9010010#, prepared for you, right?
You've come! My, you really have grown! And the Dragon also looks nothing like it used to. Although, it's still really cute...
Now, let me give you the gift that I've prepared. It's a scroll that can only be used on the #t1022097#. I made it myself, of course.

Hehehe... Actually, this isn't the end of my scrolls. I'm never cheap with my gifts! I could give another one to you now, but that'd be no fun. Get to #bLevel 60 before May 5th#k this time. I will give you another scroll that you can use on the #t1022097#.
Your Level is still a bit low; When you reach Level 50, you can receive a special gift that will only be given out during the event period. The event ends on May 4th, so be sure to hurry.
